parameters.query:
SELECT
  "public"."lead_orientation"."id" AS "id",
  "public"."lead_orientation"."created_at" AS "created_at",
  "public"."lead_orientation"."lead_id" AS "lead_id",
  "public"."lead_orientation"."orientation_id" AS "orientation_id",
  "public"."lead_orientation"."source_type" AS "source_type",
  "Lead"."candidate_id" AS "Lead__candidate_id",
  "Lead"."first_name" AS "Lead__first_name",
  "Lead"."city" AS "Lead__city",
  "Lead"."uuid" AS "Lead__uuid",
  "Phone"."countryCode" AS "Phone__countryCode",
  "Phone"."phoneNumber" AS "Phone__phoneNumber",
  "Email"."email" AS "Email__email",
  "Orientation"."id" AS "Orientation__id",
  "Orientation"."programId" AS "Orientation__programId",
  "Orientation"."milesLocationId" AS "Orientation__milesLocationId",
  "Orientation"."orientation_name" AS "Orientation__orientation_name",
  "Orientation"."orientation_date" AS "Orientation__orientation_date",
  "Miles Office"."address" AS "Miles Office__address",
  "Miles Office"."city" AS "Miles Office__city",
  "Miles Office"."contact" AS "Miles Office__contact",
  "Miles Office"."location_url" AS "Miles Office__location_url",
  "Miles Office"."lat" AS "Miles Office__lat",
  "Miles Office"."lng" AS "Miles Office__lng"
FROM
  "public"."lead_orientation"
 
LEFT JOIN "public"."lead" AS "Lead" ON "public"."lead_orientation"."lead_id" = "Lead"."id"
  LEFT JOIN "public"."phone" AS "Phone" ON "Lead"."id" = "Phone"."leadId"
  LEFT JOIN "public"."email" AS "Email" ON "Lead"."id" = "Email"."leadId"
  LEFT JOIN "public"."orientation" AS "Orientation" ON "public"."lead_orientation"."orientation_id" = "Orientation"."id"
  LEFT JOIN "public"."miles_office" AS "Miles Office" ON "Lead"."miles_office_id" = "Miles Office"."id"
where "Orientation"."programId" in (2)
LIMIT
  1048575

  "Orientation"."milesLocationId" AS "Orientation__milesLocationId",

  "Orientation"."orientation_type" AS "Orientation__orientation_type",
  "Miles Office - MilesLocationId"."id" AS "Miles Office - MilesLocationId__id",

    "Lead"."bridge_course_recommendation" #>> array [ 'can_id' ] :: text [ ]
  ) :: text AS "Lead__bridge_course_recommendation â†’ can_id",
  (
    "Lead"."bridge_course_recommendation" #>> array [ 'eligibility_code' ] :: text [ ]
  ) :: text AS "Lead__bridge_course_recommendation â†’ eligibility_code",
  (
    "Lead"."bridge_course_recommendation" #>> array [ 'recommend_arka_elective_ids' ] :: text [ ]
  ) :: text AS "Lead__bridge_course_recommendation â†’ recommend_ar_c0573d92",
  "Lead"."id" AS "Lead__id",
  "Lead"."status" AS "Lead__status",
  "Lead"."created_by" AS "Lead__created_by",
  "Lead"."updated_by" AS "Lead__updated_by",
  "Lead"."created_at" AS "Lead__created_at",
  "Lead"."updated_at" AS "Lead__updated_at",
  "Lead"."candidate_id" AS "Lead__candidate_id",
  "Lead"."first_name" AS "Lead__first_name",

  "Lead"."city" AS "Lead__city",

  "Lead"."srSpocId" AS "Lead__srSpocId",

  "Lead"."pushed_to_ats" AS "Lead__pushed_to_ats",
  "Lead"."bridge_course_recommendation" AS "Lead__bridge_course_recommendation",
  "Lead"."notify_followup" AS "Lead__notify_followup",
  "Lead"."re_enquiry_date" AS "Lead__re_enquiry_date",
  "Lead"."attempt_count" AS "Lead__attempt_count",
  "Phone"."id" AS "Phone__id",
  "Phone"."status" AS "Phone__status",
  "Phone"."created_by" AS "Phone__created_by",
  "Phone"."updated_by" AS "Phone__updated_by",
  "Phone"."created_at" AS "Phone__created_at",
  "Phone"."updated_at" AS "Phone__updated_at",
  "Phone"."countryCode" AS "Phone__countryCode",
  "Phone"."phoneNumber" AS "Phone__phoneNumber",
  "Phone"."isActive" AS "Phone__isActive",
  "Phone"."isWhatsAppNumber" AS "Phone__isWhatsAppNumber",
  "Phone"."isPrimary" AS "Phone__isPrimary",
  "Phone"."maskedPhoneNo" AS "Phone__maskedPhoneNo",
  "Phone"."phoneType" AS "Phone__phoneType",
  "Phone"."contact_removal_request_date" AS "Phone__contact_removal_request_date",
  "Phone"."reason_for_delete" AS "Phone__reason_for_delete",
  "Phone"."mode_of_communication" AS "Phone__mode_of_communication",
  "Phone"."leadId" AS "Phone__leadId",
  "Email"."id" AS "Email__id",
  "Email"."status" AS "Email__status",
  "Email"."created_by" AS "Email__created_by",
  "Email"."updated_by" AS "Email__updated_by",
  "Email"."created_at" AS "Email__created_at",
  "Email"."updated_at" AS "Email__updated_at",
  "Email"."email" AS "Email__email",
  "Email"."isActive" AS "Email__isActive",
  "Email"."isMasked" AS "Email__isMasked",
  "Email"."isPrimary" AS "Email__isPrimary",
  "Email"."maskedEmail" AS "Email__maskedEmail",
  "Email"."contact_removal_request_date" AS "Email__contact_removal_request_date",
  "Email"."reason_for_delete" AS "Email__reason_for_delete",
  "Email"."mode_of_communication" AS "Email__mode_of_communication",
  "Email"."leadId" AS "Email__leadId"
FROM
  "public"."lead_orientation"
 
LEFT JOIN "public"."orientation" AS "Orientation" ON "public"."lead_orientation"."orientation_id" = "Orientation"."id"
  LEFT JOIN "public"."miles_office" AS "Miles Office - MilesLocationId" ON "Orientation"."milesLocationId" = "Miles Office - MilesLocationId"."id"
  LEFT JOIN "public"."lead" AS "Lead" ON "public"."lead_orientation"."lead_id" = "Lead"."id"
  LEFT JOIN "public"."phone" AS "Phone" ON "Lead"."id" = "Phone"."leadId"
  LEFT JOIN "public"."email" AS "Email" ON "Lead"."id" = "Email"."leadId"
WHERE
  (
    "Miles Office - MilesLocationId"."city" = 'Hyderabad'
  )
 
   AND (
    ("Orientation"."programId" = 1)
   
    OR ("Orientation"."programId" = 2)
  )
LIMIT
  1048575
